verses.verse: And Moses <S%H4872><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> and spoke <S%H1696><s%> these <S%H428><s%> words <S%H1697><s%> to all <S%H3605><s%> Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And he said <S%H559><s%> to them, I am an hundred <S%H3967><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> this day; <S%H3117><s%> I can <S%H3201><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> more <S%H5750><s%> go <S%H3318><s%> out and come <S%H935><s%> in: also the LORD <S%H3068><s%> has said <S%H559><s%> to me, You shall not go <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> Jordan. <S%H3383><s%>

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> he will go <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you, and he will destroy <S%H8045><s%> these <S%H428><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> you, and you shall possess <S%H3423><s%> them: and Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> he shall go <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you, as the LORD <S%H3068><s%> has said. <S%H1696><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall do <S%H6213><s%> to them as he did <S%H6213><s%> to Sihon <S%H5511><s%> and to Og, <S%H5747><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%> of the Amorites, <S%H567><s%> and to the land <S%H776><s%> of them, whom <S%H834><s%> <S%H853><s%> he destroyed. <S%H8045><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall give <S%H5414><s%> them up before your face, that you may do <S%H6213><s%> to them according to all <S%H3605><s%> the commandments <S%H4687><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I have commanded <S%H6680><s%> you.

Be strong <S%H2388><s%> and of a good courage, <S%H553><s%> fear <S%H3372><s%> not, nor <S%H408><s%> be afraid <S%H6206><s%> of them: for the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> he it is that does go <S%H1980><s%> with you; he will not fail <S%H7503><s%> you, nor <S%H3808><s%> forsake <S%H5800><s%> you.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> to Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to him in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> Be strong <S%H2388><s%> and of a good courage: <S%H553><s%> for you must go <S%H935><s%> with this <S%H2088><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> to the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> has sworn <S%H7650><s%> to their fathers <S%H1><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> them; and you shall cause them to inherit <S%H5157><s%> it.

And the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> he it is that does go <S%H1980><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you; he will be with you, he will not fail <S%H7503><s%> you, neither <S%H3808><s%> forsake <S%H5800><s%> you: fear <S%H3372><s%> not, neither <S%H3808><s%> be dismayed. <S%H2865><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> wrote <S%H3789><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> law, <S%H8451><s%> and delivered <S%H5414><s%> it to the priests <S%H3548><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Levi, <S%H3878><s%> which bore <S%H5375><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and to all <S%H3605><s%> the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> them, saying, <S%H559><s%> At the end <S%H7093><s%> of every seven <S%H7651><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> in the solemnity <S%H4150><s%> of the year <S%H8141><s%> of release, <S%H8059><s%> in the feast <S%H2282><s%> of tabernacles, <S%H5521><s%>

When all <S%H3605><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> is come <S%H935><s%> to appear <S%H7200><s%> before <S%H854><s%> <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> in the place <S%H4725><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he shall choose, <S%H977><s%> you shall read <S%H7121><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> law <S%H8451><s%> before <S%H5048><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> in their hearing. <S%H241><s%>

Gather <S%H6950><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> together, men <S%H582><s%>and women, <S%H802><s%> and children, <S%H2945><s%> and your stranger <S%H1616><s%> that is within your gates, <S%H8179><s%> that they may hear, <S%H8085><s%> and that they may learn, <S%H3925><s%> and fear <S%H3372><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> and observe <S%H8104><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of this <S%H2063><s%> law: <S%H8451><s%>

And that their children, <S%H1121><s%> which <S%H834><s%> have not known <S%H3045><s%> any thing, may hear, <S%H8085><s%> and learn <S%H3925><s%> to fear <S%H3372><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> as long <S%H3117><s%> as you live <S%H2416><s%> in the land <S%H127><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> you go <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> Jordan <S%H3383><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> it.

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> Behold, <S%H2005><s%> your days <S%H3117><s%> approach <S%H7126><s%> that you must die: <S%H4191><s%> call <S%H7121><s%> Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> and present <S%H3320><s%> yourselves in the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation, <S%H4150><s%> that I may give him a charge. <S%H6680><s%> And Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Joshua <S%H3091><s%> went, <S%H3212><s%> and presented <S%H3320><s%> themselves in the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation. <S%H4150><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> appeared <S%H7200><s%> in the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> in a pillar <S%H5982><s%> of a cloud: <S%H6051><s%> and the pillar <S%H5982><s%> of the cloud <S%H6051><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle. <S%H168><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> you shall sleep <S%H7901><s%> with your fathers; <S%H1><s%> and this <S%H2088><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> will rise <S%H6965><s%> up, and go a whoring <S%H2181><s%> after <S%H310><s%> the gods <S%H430><s%> of the strangers <S%H5236><s%> of the land, <S%H776><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> they go <S%H935><s%> to be among <S%H7130><s%> them, and will forsake <S%H5800><s%> me, and break <S%H6565><s%> my covenant <S%H1285><s%> which I have made <S%H3772><s%> with them.

Then my anger <S%H639><s%> shall be kindled <S%H2734><s%> against them in that day, <S%H3117><s%> and I will forsake <S%H5800><s%> them, and I will hide <S%H5641><s%> my face <S%H6440><s%> from them, and they shall be devoured, <S%H398><s%> and many <S%H7227><s%> evils <S%H7451><s%> and troubles <S%H6869><s%> shall befall <S%H4672><s%> them; so that they will say <S%H559><s%> in that day, <S%H3117><s%> Are not these <S%H428><s%> evils <S%H7451><s%> come <S%H4672><s%> on us, because <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3588><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> is not among <S%H7130><s%> us?

And I will surely hide <S%H5641><s%> my face <S%H6440><s%> in that day <S%H3117><s%> for all <S%H3605><s%> the evils <S%H7451><s%> which <S%H834><s%> they shall have worked, <S%H6213><s%> in that they are turned <S%H6437><s%> to other <S%H312><s%> gods. <S%H430><s%>

Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore write <S%H3789><s%> you this <S%H2063><s%> song <S%H7892><s%> for you, and teach <S%H3925><s%> it the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%> put <S%H7760><s%> it in their mouths, <S%H6310><s%> that this <S%H2063><s%> song <S%H7892><s%> may be a witness <S%H5707><s%> for me against the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

For when <S%H3588><s%> I shall have brought <S%H935><s%> them into <S%H413><s%> the land <S%H127><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I swore <S%H7650><s%> to their fathers, <S%H1><s%> that flows <S%H2100><s%> with milk <S%H2461><s%> and honey; <S%H1706><s%> and they shall have eaten <S%H398><s%> and filled <S%H7646><s%> themselves, and waxen fat; <S%H1878><s%> then will they turn <S%H6437><s%> to other <S%H312><s%> gods, <S%H430><s%> and serve <S%H5647><s%> them, and provoke <S%H5006><s%> me, and break <S%H6565><s%> my covenant. <S%H1285><s%>

And it shall come <S%H1961><s%> to pass, when <S%H3588><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> evils <S%H7451><s%> and troubles <S%H6869><s%> are befallen <S%H4672><s%> them, that this <S%H2063><s%> song <S%H7892><s%> shall testify <S%H6030><s%> against <S%H6440><s%> them as a witness; <S%H5707><s%> for it shall not be forgotten <S%H7911><s%> out of the mouths <S%H6310><s%> of their seed: <S%H2233><s%> for I know <S%H3045><s%> their imagination <S%H3336><s%> which <S%H834><s%> they go <S%H6213><s%> about, <S%H6213><s%> even now, <S%H3117><s%> before <S%H2962><s%> I have brought <S%H935><s%> them into <S%H413><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I swore. <S%H7650><s%>

Moses <S%H4872><s%> therefore wrote <S%H3789><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> song <S%H7892><s%> the same <S%H1931><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> and taught <S%H3925><s%> it the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And he gave Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun <S%H5126><s%> a charge, <S%H6680><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Be strong <S%H2388><s%> and of a good courage: <S%H553><s%> for you shall bring <S%H935><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I swore <S%H7650><s%> to them: and I will be with you.

And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass, when Moses <S%H4872><s%> had made an end <S%H3615><s%> of writing <S%H3789><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of this <S%H2063><s%> law <S%H8451><s%> in a book, <S%H5612><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> they were finished, <S%H8552><s%>

That Moses <S%H4872><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> the Levites, <S%H3881><s%> which <S%H834><s%> bore <S%H5375><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Take <S%H3947><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> book <S%H5612><s%> of the law, <S%H8451><s%> and put <S%H7760><s%> it in the side <S%H6654><s%> of the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> that it may be there <S%H8033><s%> for a witness <S%H5707><s%> against you.

For I know <S%H3045><s%> your rebellion, <S%H4805><s%> and your stiff <S%H7186><s%> neck: <S%H6203><s%> behold, <S%H2005><s%> while I am yet <S%H5750><s%> alive <S%H2416><s%> with you this day, <S%H3117><s%> you have been <S%H1961><s%> rebellious <S%H4784><s%> against <S%H5973><s%> the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> and how <S%H637><s%> much more after <S%H310><s%> my death? <S%H4194><s%>

Gather <S%H6950><s%> to me all <S%H3605><s%> the elders <S%H2205><s%> of your tribes, <S%H7626><s%> and your officers, <S%H7860><s%> that I may speak <S%H1696><s%> these <S%H428><s%> words <S%H1697><s%> in their ears, <S%H241><s%> and call <S%H5749><s%> heaven <S%H8064><s%> and earth <S%H776><s%> to record <S%H5749><s%> against them.

For I know <S%H3045><s%> that after <S%H310><s%> my death <S%H4194><s%> you will utterly corrupt <S%H7843><s%> yourselves, and turn <S%H5493><s%> aside from the way <S%H1870><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I have commanded <S%H6680><s%> you; and evil <S%H7451><s%> will befall <S%H7122><s%> you in the latter <S%H319><s%> days; <S%H3117><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> you will do <S%H6213><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> to provoke him to anger <S%H3707><s%> through the work <S%H4639><s%> of your hands. <S%H3027><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> in the ears <S%H241><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the congregation <S%H4150><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of this <S%H2063><s%> song, <S%H7892><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> they were ended. <S%H8552><s%>
